description: Add or remove a static route.

metric.description: Metric used by the static route.

destination.description: Destination IP address in CIDR format (ip address/prefix lenght)

gateway.description: Gateway used by the static route. If gateway is not provided it will be set to "0.0.0.0"

state.description: If present, it adds a network static route. If absent, it removes a network static route.
